00021 typedef short                                                           BX_SHORT; // 16 Bit signed

00046 #define max(a,b)            (((a) > (b)) ? (a) : (b))
00047 
00048 #define min(a,b)            (((a) < (b)) ? (a) : (b))
00049 
00050 #define BXMIN   min
00051 #define BXMAX   max
00052 #define BXABS(c) ((c)<(0) ? (-c) : (c))
00053 
00054 #define BX_MAKEWORD(a, b)      ((BX_WORD)(((BX_BYTE)(a)) | ((BX_WORD)((BX_BYTE)(b))) << 8))
00055 #define BX_MAKELONG(a, b)      ((BX_LONG)(((BX_WORD)(a)) | ((BX_DWORD)((BX_WORD)(b))) << 16))
00056 #define BX_LOWORD(l)           ((BX_WORD)(l))
00057 #define BX_HIWORD(l)           ((BX_WORD)(((BX_DWORD)(l) >> 16) & 0xFFFF))
00058 #define BX_LOBYTE(w)           ((BX_BYTE)(w))
00059 #define BX_HIBYTE(w)           ((BX_BYTE)(((BX_WORD)(w) >> 8) & 0xFF))
